entities.description: Variables including education, employment, health insurance, and income.
Edited variables from drug sections and sections related to those drugs.
Documentation for the consumption of alcohol.
Documentation for physical and mental health.
Variables related to household roster and interview information.
Key source variables used in creating edited, imputed, or recoded variables.

Revised variables including selected demographic variables, drug use variables, SUD variables, substance use treatment location and type variables, mental health services utilization location and type variables, and adult mental health measures.
Provided for each variable to determine if an observation contains data from the questionnaire or from an imputed value.
Used as source variables for the recoded variables.
Sections that recode data including 'OTHER, Specify' data or logically assigned data.

relationships.description: Includes documentation for health insurance variables.
Includes documentation for edited variables from drug sections.
Follows documentation for the alcohol section.
Follows documentation for the physical and mental health sections.
Contains variables related to household roster and interview information.
